00089 
00090 #        ifdef TARGET_OS_WINDOWS
00091 
00092     struct GoThreadProc_Params
00093     {
00094         CoreCPUID *cpuid_class;
00095         int processor;
00096     };
00097 
00098     static DWORD CALLBACK s_GoThreadProc ( LPVOID lpParameter )
00099     {
00100         return ( ( GoThreadProc_Params * ) lpParameter )->cpuid_class->
00101             GoThread ( ( LPVOID * ) &
00102                        ( ( GoThreadProc_Params * ) lpParameter )->processor );
00103     };
00104     DWORD WINAPI GoThread ( LPVOID * params );
00105 #        else
00106     long int GoThread ( int processor );
00107 #        endif
00108 
00109     void AddCacheDescription ( int processor, const char *description );
00110     void AddCacheData ( int processor, int x );
00111     void DetectManufacturer ( int processor );
00112     void DetectProcessorName ( int processor );
00113     void DetectCacheInfo ( int processor );
00114     void DetectFMS ( int processor );

00120                          int _processor, const char *_name );
